item.title: AWS Lambda function to retrieve Twitter follower count
item.description: Intro ðŸ‘‡ One of my goals for this current year is to get more comfortable with AWS and get certified eventually. Therefore I will be trying out different things and blogging about it here. I am starting out with a quite simple task and that is deploying an AWS Lambda function. In this case an AWS Lambda function that retrieves the count of your current Twitter followers. Everytime the AWS API endpoint gets called, a Python script will run that will retrieve the current stats from the Twitter API and then returns it in JSON format so it can be easily used across systems.
